Name: Eugene Agichtein
Title: Professor
Office Hours: Thursday: 1:00PM - 3:00PM (CSI PhD Advising @ the MathCS Advising Room)
Research: I lead the  Emory Intelligent Information Access Lab (IRLab) . We work on information retrieval and text and data mining, including mining online user behavior and interactions in web search and online social networks, large-scale content analysis and information extraction, and on applications of these techniques to medical domains.
